11.content:
The next day at Grimwood acadamey a ghoul by the name of Astrid, arrived to a gloomy scene of Tannis, Phantamsa, Sibella, all gathered around a table with a book ( worn leathure bound one) on it and by the looks of it was a photo album. they looked up as Astrid came into the room. "Hi, I'm looking for a Mrs. Grimwood, I'm a new student here, with a pretty amazing ablity."

Sibella pointed to the door that lead to the kitchen. "She is in there, makeing HIS favourtie food for supper tonight." she sniffled.

"Sorry but who is he?" asked Astrid curiously

"Jason Jr. he was murdered a couple days ago." Sibella responded

"How?" Astrid asked looking at the book seeing a picture of him

"He was cut in half by Freddy Krueger and a bunch of other killers." Phanty replied

"Do you still have the body?" asked Astrid, an idea forming in her head.

"Why, do you want to know?" Tannis asked

"I can bring back the dead with my blood." Astrid explained.

"That would be great" Tannis replied as Winnie entered the room

"We don't were the body is, plus it would probaly useless " Winnie said emotionless
"... it was torn to shreads with a chainsaw" Winnie sulked clenching a locket around her chest

"Who was this Jason anyway?" Astrid asked

15.content:
Al sild down underground tunnels to see a bunch of cloaked men as he applied a black cloak and placed a mask over his face as two wooden doors opened to an underground base as he saw Death jr. and the some of the Hand members sitting at table as Alucard sat down as the Black hand started one of there meetings
"the topics are as fallows: 1, as most of you know, since we had or old stakeout base in Crystal lake the son of Jason Voorhees was suspected as the leader my the Council of Hell, it pains me to say considering he was a close friend, he has been killed, a week ago a murderer named Leatherface chainsawed Jason voorhees Jr. in half," Al said the most of the Hand gasped
"I can't believe lt an innocennt boy get killed, that's not what the Black hand stands for, we protect the innocent" an unidentified masked member said
"Hey, sacrifices must be made, i pains me too but we have to move on Alucard" DJ said (this coming from the guy who tried to kill him and his fiancee last summer)
"Reason Two, With Voorhees dead, who was suspected as the head of our operation we have to lay-low and disband until things settle down, tell the everyone in the operation" Alucard said
"This is everyone, we don't know how but somehow Voorhees Sr. found an enrollment list of or soliders, and he's been "Cutting them lose" over the death of his son, he has killed over 4/5th of our men" another soldier said
"That lead me to the final reason: with all thats happining i can't take this stress, i thought i could but the grief is eating me alive..."he said as everyone quieted down leaning in..."I'm leaving the Black Hand" Al replied with no emotion
"Dude, you can't leave the operation, we can't go to fight without our leader" another soldier said
"You don't have too, ...DJ you're my best friend, you've always been there for me, please do me a favor and lead the operation, i'm leaving, goodbye" Alucard said exiting
(in the woods)
Alucard as skipping stones in the river a heard a voice behind him
"So you're finally giving up?" the voice said as Al turned seeing Johnny Blaze
"I don't know, i can't take the stress anymore, the worst part is i heard the devil say he as gonna kill Jason, i didn't think he'd actually do it" Alucard responded
"Technically he didn't, that skin masked chainsaw weilder cut him in half, but you're making the right choice, Jason just got caught in the crossfire, innocennt people dont desreve to die for the sins of others, Jason was innocent, no fathers devastated and the werewolf princess is heartbroken" Johnny said
"Yeah, Winnie should be heartbroken, she lost the love of her life...and it's all because of ME!!, IM SUCH A DICK!!" Alucard excliamed breaking down crying
"Just remember this talk, i best get going" the rider said said getting on his Hellcycle as vanishing in flames

154.title: Heartbroken

1541.content:
Winnie woke up up hearing a motorcycle as she looked out her window seeing Johnny blaze in the school yard staring at her
"You miss him, don't you"Johnny said as Winnie climbed out her window almost wanting to smack him
"Of corse i MISS him, I LOVED him" Winnie replied as he sat don next to her
"I'll never forget how he risked himself to save you, that is true love, a kid like Voorhees doesn't come around often, someone who could risk being killed to protect the girl he loves" Johnny said as Winnie started crying
"It should've been me, Jason died protecting me, IT SHOULD"VE BEEN ME!" Winnie excliamed
"Don't say that, It's what Jason would've wanted"Johnny said as Winnie remembered what he said the first year they met when he was captured by Freddy when she was holding the chain to his saw pit the spikes were closing in on her and he pushed her out of the way
"Look Winnie, even if Jason is dead he's still here, his spirit is with us, and if you want to talk with him he'll listen" Johnny said getting up riding in the woods seperating himself from Winnie as he stopped seeing figure wearing a torn brown burlap cloak
"You did a good job boy" Johnny said as the figure put down the hood revealing to be a scared Jason Voorhess missing the skin from his face (with Leatherface removed but he covered it with the shadow of the hood)
"Why do i have to remain hidden like this, i haven't even talked to my future wife since you rescued me" Jason asked mildly pissed but also confused
"All to be revealed soon, I know no contact could be painful, so i'll let you Haunt one person meaning you can talk to them but only they can see and hear you you could socialize with you fiancee, she really misses you and she's heartbroken but on the other hand your father is wreaking thru everything that comes his way" Johnny said
"He does that all the time but i really miss him, my dad's always been there for me so i have two choices i choose______" Jason repied

1541121112122.title: akward

15411211121221.content:
As Phanty and Spade were reading the letter, a tear came to Phanty's eye and Spade had a look of

concern. Sibella quickly took notice and made her way over to them to see what was going on. “What's

the matter guys”? Sibella asked in concerned tone of voice. “It's....it's Alucard” replied Phanty,

sniffling. “He's....he's”. “He's what”? Urged Al's concerned older sister. “He's gone” said Spade with

disdain. “Gone”? Questioned Sibella. “Gone like what”? “Like Gone gone, as in he's not coming back”

replied Spade. “It's all in this letter” he said handing it to Sibella as he went to comfort Phanty. Sibella

read over the letter with disbelief. “This is ridiculous” she says, dumbfounded. “He says he blames

himself for J.J's death and that he's leaving to make things right, whatever that means. Why in the

world would he think it's his fault”? Sibella asked. Winnie looks shifty eyed around the room,

wondering if she should tell them the truth. What does she decide to do?

choices: Went to the base to investigate
154112111212212112.content:
(In the woods) Alucard was walking as he stopped sitting down on a mossy log focusing on the death of his friend
"Jason, i'm so sorry, i should've protected you, you were just an inocennt human brought in my struggles, i should've never moved my men to Crystal Lake,what was thinking, I shown've known" Al said crying as the cold rain hit the back of his cloak
"You can say that again" a voice said as Al turned around seeing Jason mutilated with his entire left arm and half his chest missing Alucard gasped as the maggot-infested jason slowly approch Alucard as he removed his bloodstained hockey mask a snake crawled out of his eye scoket hitting the ground
"Jason, i'm so sorry, I never meant to bring you into my problems, I just wanted...to use my FATHER as your personal lap-dog!!" Alucard said pleading as Jason yelled cutting him off
"Remember when you said you used Crystal lake as the location because of my dad's hobbies, you were using his to protect you, you F***ing coward, and you call yourself a prince and a leader, because of your STUPID OPERATION and your stupid Black Hand I'm dead" Jason said leaning over all as Spiders crawled out of his hair
"I never anticipated you wold be kiled" Al said crying
"Shut Up, how did you not know, your base was on my family property, and you even ambusihed me and my Fiancee" Jason yelled straching his fingers into a branch causing his fingers to rip off
"DJ, did that, I didn't know, and by the way, I saved your life" Alucard debated stating if he didn't Death Jr. would've killed him and Winnie
"That why am i dead?" Jason asked sarcastically
"Bec....becau....Because i should've protected you" Al said crying in his hands
"Stop saying that" Jason replied "I choose to die, I ran into Leatherface on purpose, if not he would've killed Winnie, It's called selflessness, look it up" Jason said walking away vanishing as Alucard got up he walked the other to see Jason SR. in front of him swinging his machete making a bloody SLASH
"AAHHH..." Al yelled as woke up screaming in his room, "It was all a dream" Al said as his phone rang
"Hello" he responded tiredly as he heard a voice on the other side
"Alucard help us man were in serious danger" the voice said
"Mahalik, whats going on?" Al asked worried
"He found the base, he's killing everyone, must of our men are dead" Mahilk said
"who found the base?" Alucard quickly asked
"Vo....ahhhh...please no, i'm begging you..."Mahilk yelled as there was a scream the silence"
Alucard___
154112111212212112.title: Undead Conversation

1541121112122121121.content:
Alucard quickly slapped his clothes on as he opened his bedroom window transforming as he flew thru the freezing rain with so many emotions overcoming him, "why was the hand being killed, why was this happening, why now, and by who" Alucard thought transforming to vampire form as he opened the secret gate to their new hideout which led to an underground den similar to their old one as walked down the hallway seeing two soldier with their necks snapped and heads ripped off
"Brutal" Alucard thought as he kept progressing putting his cloak over as he kept passing more dead body each more brutally murderd than the last as someone grabbed his arm pulling him into a closet as he turned on a flashlight
"DJ, thank goodness it's you, what happened?" Al asked heartbroke seeing his friends and soldiers murdered
'You're a little late Alucard" Dj said midly crying "they're all dead" DJ spit out
"Can't you bring them back?" Al asked hopefully
"No... i may be able to control death but i can't bring back someone who suffered from it" DJ said blankly
"Oh shit..." Alucard said shocked
"You have to get out, he'll kill you" DJ said staring at Al
"Who, who's doing this" Alucard asked
"Voorhees, when he found out about his son's death he went beserk, he's been killing the hand since, but he's never done a mass killing, usally he picks them off" DJ said
"Let me talk to him, he'll listen to me" Al said leaving the closet
"Dude it's suicide" DJ said as Al turned back
"Then I'll see you in hell" Alucard said walking away proceeding as he saw Voorhess gutting a soldier still breathing with his bare hands
"Mr. Voorhees!" Alucard yelled out as Jason Sr. turned looking at Al he spread his arms apart causing the now-dead soldiers body to tear in two as he approched al not identifying him but cold tell he was in charge by the marking on his robe as he pulled out his machete
"it's me Alucard" Al said removing the mask as Jason still proceeded as he....
1541121112122121121.title: The Berserk

15411211121221211211.content:
Jason Sr. Ran towards Al like an enraged beast.

The 6 foot tall being had agility, anger and adrenalin pumping through him to the point to where he fought on with blood rage.(A state of mind where you keep fighting until you see the blood you want.)

"Please Mr. Voorhees stop it doesn't have to be like this. I can help you." Al pleaded.

Jason Sr. either didn't hear him or didn't care, because he kept slashing until he finally wounded the young prince of darkness.

Al realized that he would have to either fight back or suffer dying under the hands of Jason's father.

Al then became enraged and leaped towards Jason to fight back.

"I'm sorry Mr. Voorhees I have to much to loose if I die.Al yelled.

Voorhees just gave a cold dead stare.

Al tried to Leap on to him to strike Jason Sr. with his claws.

But Jason tossed him around like a rag doll breaking his arms and a few ribs almost expecting Al to do that.

Now with Al almost completely defenseless he was at the mercy of Jason Sr.

Jason takes a good look at Al and realized who he is. Jason thinks for a minute and decides to___
15411211121221211211.title: Jason VS Alucard

154112111212212112111.content:
Jason walked up to Al as he cowarded in fear imaging the worst as he stopped as Alucard stared ead-eyed at him him punched Al in the face knocking him out as he hit the ground. Jason turned around and left the room leave Alucard surrounded by piles of his dead Black Hand soldiers as Al drifted in the the dream world he felt a hand "Bitch-slap" him as he sprung up
"Wake up sleeping ugly" a voice said as Al's vision focused in on a old face of which was his master the blind swordsman
"Master, how did you find me?" Al asked as The Swordsman slapped him again
"I'm you master, Bitch" the master said swinging his cane thru the air
"How could you let the hunk of brainless meat beat you, you dishonor my training" The master said pointing at a tree
"Master, I'm over here" Al said as The Swordsman turned to Al
"What do ya expect, i'm motherfucking blind" the swordsman said
"Master train me, i'm desperate" Al pleaded
"Come with me" the swordsman said holding his hand out as Alucard grabbed it
"In my hand i hold a cricket" Swordsman said as Alucard snatched it
"To slow old man" Al said
"Who the hell, take Metronome from my hand, Metronome is pet and lucky cricket, give Metronome back shithead" Swordsman said as Al opened his hand revealing a dead cricket
"You Dumbass, you squish lucky cricket" Swordsman said bitchslapping Al
"Care to tell me, why Alex Crusan, knows your fighting style" Alucard said
"So you know, well you batty son of bitch, i wouldn't lie to you, Alex Crusan was my greatest student" The swordsman said
"Really?" Alucard asked
"Course he was, he whooped YOUR ass in 3 moves remember 3rd year" Swordsman said pulling out a leather book with the Writing "Jason at Ghoul School III- Monsters of Rock".
"Ahem chapter 12 and i quote"Alucard charged Spade as he dodged him the two of them trading blows as Spade threw off his jacket wearing a black sleveeless Tshirt and did a 360 spin kicking Al in the face as he fell over Spade walked to him as he got up he jammed the katanas in the wall in an X pattern around Al's neck as he couldn't move" , i tought him everymove i know" Swordsman said
"wait the event's are in a book seires?" Alucard asked, yeah pick it up sometime, But if i was you i'd skip chapter 40, lets just say the conversation between Spider and your sister gets a little steamy" Swordsman said chuckling
"Wait!!, you've taught him everything, even stuff i don't even know about" Alucard said
"There some fighting moves you could never master, you see, with honesty, Alex Crusan is my son" The swordsman said
"Impossible, spade never met his father" Alucard said
"I Never told him who i was, If your you were Rockstar would you believe ancient warrior is your father" The swordsman asked, you see when i met Sunny Crusan i know she was something special, you see I live forever, that's why i never marry or cling to women buy Sunny, she was the hottest piece of ass i've ever seen, so we met had a nice life 9 month later My son come along, 5 years later his sister Lexi, but being who i was i couldn't stay so i left i gave my powers in the Guitar Pick Necklace He wears, the day he was born, i swear I've been looking over him his whole life, and he mostly has a guitar in his hands, That's why he can shred, i visited him in his subconscious mind and train him " The swordsman said
"Very emotional but my training" Al said as Swordsman smacked him
"You have not learned ANYTHING, power does NOT come a Crazy old foul-mouthed blind man, power comes from you" Swordsman said smacking him as he woke up clenching his hand throwing the dead cricket as he headed thru the woods
154112111212212112111.title: Confrontation

1542.content:
It was Alucard, perched on a branch in the tree outside Winnie's window. He saw the look of despair on

her face as she fell asleep and he let out a heavy sigh. “Winnie” he muttered to himself. “I-I'm so sorry

about...” He paused for a moment to gain his composure. “About everything” He finished, grabbing his

tote bag and hopping down from the tree. He heard thunder and looked up. Sure enough, it had begun

pouring rain. 'Hm' Al thought looking up into the darkened night sky. “Even the sky itself weeps

alongside me” he said as tears rolled down his face. He began walking away from the school,

remembering the note he left on Phanty's bed for her to find. 'They'll figure it out before too much

longer' Al thought. 'Phanty, I'm sorry to do this to you and on Valentines Day no less' Al thought as he

continued making his trek, the rain pouring down onto his face and hair. 'Hopefully you will find it in

your heart to forgive me.....someday'. “I'm lost....and....and so confused” he said. “And....(Alucard has a

flashback to the day he killed Michael Myers) This power” he said, clenching his fist. 'It's so dark and

cold inside' he thought as he continued to trudge along the muddy dirt path. 'Is this what I truly am

inside? Is this what I am destined to become' he thought, picturing the image of himself in that raging

monstrous form? 'In any case, I know one thing for sure, I need guidance' he thought gazing up into the

rainy, dreary, cloud filled sky. “I don't know where you are, or how to find you” said Al out loud to

himself as he continued walking. “But I know you are the only one who truly understands me and my

power. So ready or not, here I come......Master.....” He said as he faded away into the darkness of the

rain drenched night.
1542.title: Alucard's Departure

info.brief_description: Starts up where Monsters of Rock leaves off, Jason dead, Winnie heartbroken, Al in guilt
info.description:
this story starts off where Monsters of Rock leaves off, Jason has been Killed which leaves Winnie heartbroken and Al is blamming all the guilt on himself, he thinks about disbanding his hole organization but little does he know a certian mole in the organization is looking to take control can all those broken wounds be mended, find out inJason at Ghoul School 4: Hellstorm

list of cast
the students
Jason Voorhees Jr. (age 15)-(DEAD)son of Jason Voorhees Sr. artistic,pacifistal,engaged with Winnie
Sibella Dracula (age 18)-Daughter of Count Dracula, Princess of Vampires, very strongwilled but peaceful, in a relationship ith Spider
Alucard (Al) Dracula (age 17)-Son of Count Dracula, Prince of Vampires (technically not a student), strongheaded, expert fighter, formally led an underground operation with DJ (Death Jr.),in a relationship with Phanty
Phantamsa "Phanty" Phantom (age 17)-Daughter of Phantom of the opera,musically talented on pipe organ, loves being funny and making people laugh, in a relationship with Alucard
Winnie Werewolf (age 14)-Daughter of the Wolfman/Werewolf, Princees of Werewolves, tomboyish,likes sports,likes howling,engaged to Jason,cousins with Steven
Tanis Mummy (age 10)-Daughter of a Mummy, shy around people but very kind-hearted has a crush on Ricky(Scarab)

the bandmates
Major Allen(Alan Johnson)-lead vocals/rythem guitar(age 22) long blond hair typical headbanging metal head(based of Bret Michaels/Ronnie James Dio/Zakk Wylde)
Spade (Alex Crusan)(pronounced crusin')-lead guitar (age18)extrmely good guitarist long black hair carefree most of the time(based of CiCi DeVille/Slash)
Spider-bass (age 20) gothic outcast black dreadlocks with tips dyed bloody red wears a red hourglass belt eyes are red due to a rare blood disaise so blood comes out of his eyes when he crys (based off Ozzy/Aice Cooper/Marilyn manson/Murdoc Niccials)
Steven Cannete (pronounced can-it)-drums (age 16) redneck drummer sholder lenth red hair very strong (based off (Axl Rose/Lemmy Kilmister/Billy Idol)
Scarab(Ricky Akmun)(pronounced oak-moon)-Rythem guitarist (age 12) born in Egypt light brown skin dark brown dreadlocks wears an ankh medalion which he never takes off and can speak egyptian (based of Jimi Hendrix/Prince/Tom Morello/Lenny Kravitz)

Monster forms
Major- a steampunkish cyborgitic man (weapon-guns)
Spade- a skeletal swordsman (weapon- two swords)
Steven- a native american spirt who can shapeshift into animals
Spider- a demon made of leather and metal fragment (Power given by a ring unknowingly crafted by Damien)
Scarab- a egyptian zombie warrior coated in rock fragments (abilities-Magic powers)

Other characters
Death Jr. (D.J.)- Alucard's best friend and co leader in the black hand
Johnny Blaze(Ghost Rider)- a bounty hunter for Hell who is protecting Jason's spirit
Damien- Son of Lucifer (Devil) Alucard's nemisis for killer his (and Sibella's) Mother
Rules
1.Love and romance can be added but please give warning
2.No 1 sentance chapters
3.Please read the story to get ideas before adding completly irrelevent chapters (nothing irratates me more,)
4.No Original characters in story (unless i give permission)
NOTE:
i have right to edit/delete your chapter if i find errors with it, but i usally contact writter first
